page.title: 10FARNHAM CASTLE
page.content: The CASTLE is situated on the edge of {Farnham Park}and dominates the town below. It was Henry of Blois,brother of King Stephen, who had the castle built in 1138. Farnham Castle was very important during the {Civil War.} It was built of white chalk and must have been a lovely sight against the green hills. Now part of the Castle is {The Centre for {International Briefing},used by people who are going to work abroad.At the Centre you have a week to immerse youself and call on expert help to teach the language,customs and laws of the country.At present Farnham Castle is owned by the English Heritage and is open to the public during the week
